item.title: 华盛顿州和爱达荷州分别发生雪崩，造成两名雪地摩托车手丧生。阅读更多

Two snowmobilers were killed in separate avalanches in Washington state and in Idaho, officials say.

item.title: 美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）根据出口民调分析预测，拜登总统将赢得弗吉尼亚州民主党初选。

item.title: 现场报道：美国广播公司新闻直播间将持续报道 16 个州和 1 个地区的选民在超级星期二--2024 选举周期中最大的初选日--的投票情况：

item.title: 前总统特朗普正在寻求对 E. Jean Carroll 提起的诽谤案进行重审，认为法官对他的证词限制不当。

item.title: 参议员约翰-巴拉索（John Barrasso）宣布，他将寻求参议院共和党二号领导人的职位--这打破了人们长期以来对他将竞争少数党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）最高职位的预期。
item.description:
Sen. John Barrasso has announced that he's seeking the No. 2 Senate GOP leadership position — bucking long-held expectations that he'd vie for Minority Leader Mitch McConnell's top spot. https://t.co/iYVGPzIEmx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 五届艾迪塔罗德雪橇犬赛冠军得主达拉斯-西维（Dallas Seavey）被迫向一头 "愤怒的驼鹿 "开枪并开膛破肚。
item.description:
Five-time Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race champ Dallas Seavey was forced to fatally shoot and gut what he described as an "angry moose" after the animal became entangled with his team of dogs, according to officials of the Alaska competition. https://t.co/irIVX3oFk9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 官员说，新的视频显示，密歇根州一家电子烟分销公司发生猛烈爆炸，一名 19 岁的少年在四分之一英里外丧生。
item.description:
New video shows the fiery explosion at a vaping distributing company in Michigan that killed a 19-year-old a quarter mile away, officials say.

Fire officials say the teen was struck in the head and killed by a canister sent flying by the blast. https://t.co/GPerOXg2jJ pic.twitter.com/R4H0CiLAkZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 有六人因涉嫌从中国走私数千磅生鹅肠和鸭肠并最终运到纽约市销售给餐馆和消费者而被捕。

item.title: 据警方称，在纽约西巴比伦的两个地方发现了更多的人体遗骸，一周前，在长岛的一个公园里发现了属于两个人的断肢。
item.description:

item.title: 美国国家气象局说，暴雨横扫该州，给部分地区带来暴雨、强风和冰雹，新奥尔良市中心的道路宛如河流。
item.description:
The roads in downtown New Orleans resembled rivers after heavy rain caused flash flooding in parts of the city.

Storms pushed across the state, bringing heavy rainfall, strong winds and hail to parts of the area, the NWS said. https://t.co/rdJQaBHo7M pic.twitter.com/QsMHHdy5OD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：亚利桑那州的柯尔斯滕-西内玛（Kyrsten Sinema）宣布不再竞选连任，并将在今年年底离开参议院。西内玛在2019年以民主党人身份当选，但在2022年离开该党成为独立候选人。
item.description:
BREAKING: Arizona’s Kyrsten Sinema has announced that she is not running for reelection and will leave the Senate at the end of the year.

Sinema was elected in 2019 as a Democrat but left the party to become an independent in 2022. https://t.co/TlIUaSSLf1 pic.twitter.com/s0fJ9Hb3nv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：亚利桑那州的柯尔斯滕-辛玛（Kyrsten Sinema）周二宣布不再竞选连任，并将于今年年底离开参议院。
item.description:
BREAKING: Arizona’s Kyrsten Sinema announced Tuesday that she is not running for reelection and will leave the Senate at the end of the year. https://t.co/XTQ5MS3aCS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 北达科他州一名检察官拒绝对三名俾斯麦警官提出指控，他们在去年秋天的一次交通拦截中涉嫌枪杀一名少年。
item.description:

item.title: 密苏里州的一项新法案将规定，学校教师或辅导员支持或帮助变性未成年人进行社会转型属于重罪--拟议的法律还将把犯罪者列入性犯罪者登记册。
item.description:
A new Missouri bill would make it a felony offense for school teachers or counselors to support or contribute to the social transitioning of a transgender minor — the proposed law would also have an offender be placed on the sexual offender registry. https://t.co/ySNfVZcVjx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，德克萨斯州一名消防队长周二在扑救一场建筑物火灾时不幸身亡，他所在的小镇是上周席卷整个潘汉德尔地区的历史性大火的重灾区之一。
item.description:
A Texas fire chief — whose small town was among the hardest hit last week by historic blazes sweeping across the Panhandle — died Tuesday while fighting a structure fire, authorities said. https://t.co/SR9kkkhMly

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 据 @ABC 新闻最早获得的文件显示，众议院调查国家应对冠状病毒大流行的小组委员会周二传唤了安德鲁-科莫（Andrew Cuomo），内容涉及他的政府在大流行期间对养老院的处理。
item.description:
The House subcommittee investigating the nation's response to the coronavirus pandemic subpoenaed Andrew Cuomo on Tuesday in relation to his administration's handling of nursing homes during the pandemic, according to documents first obtained by @ABC News. https://t.co/WvmUt9WO6B pic.twitter.com/CA5Oyb5tCX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024
